Name: Asimov Laws
About the game: They said you are the modern incarnation of Noah. The Asimov Organization put their faith in you. Every established Lighthouse marked the sacrifice of the members. Yet the robotic butlers are so strong, so unfathomable and so prepared. Can you make it to the Ark? Robopocalypse cyberpunk The 12 cities are depressing, deprived and cordoned off. Impulse device and watchtowers are deployed all over the regions. Robotic butlers and wardens are everywhere. Material privation has been enforced for a very long period. Remember to get back home before the night. Rouge lite survival experience Thirst, hunger, robot butlers at night, physical and mental disorders and many other unfavorable conditions. Survive in this deprived world is harder than ever before. Plan your days, plan your route, get away from the hunt down of the robotic butlers. Brutal and sophisticated combat Multiple combat styles can be developed combining close combat and adaptive abilities variously. 12 implicit occupations available. Elaborated genetic adaptations Utilize the mysterious technology preserved by the Asimov Organization to gain the power of Noah. Reveal the mystery as you explore more.
